channel.title: Weapon Specs
channel.description: For some odd reason, special attacks won't work on Players. They work perfectly fine on NPCs though. When you spec someone with a godsword, it does the regular hit emote, and the Spec's GFX. But on an NPC, it shows the Spec Emote and the GFX as well. Does anyone know what might be causing this..? Thanks! I'm using a 317, delta base

item.title: Weapon Specs
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

For some odd reason, special attacks won’t work on Players. They work perfectly fine on NPCs though. When you spec someone with a godsword, it does the regular hit emote, and the Spec’s GFX. But on an NPC, it shows the Spec Emote and the GFX as well. Does anyone know what might be causing this…? Thanks! I’m using a 317, delta base

Read full topic
